homepage.heading1: Full-stack Javascript/PHP web developer from France & Canada
homepage.intro: I enjoy learning by working on challenging projects. I write concise, legible & maintainable code.
homepage.intro2: I am specialized in Typescript and PHP applications, Docker and generative AI with 5+ years of experience.

TechStack.heading: Technologies I know
TechStack.note: VueJS & Nuxt are very similar to React & NextJS. Although I haven't worked with them directly in production, I am very familliar with the technologies and will easily adapt. I would love to learn more through some challenging projets.
